Content:: Kandiah Navaratnam (born 2 January 1935) is a Sri Lankan Tamil politician and former Member of Parliament. Navaratnam was born on 2 January 1935.[1] He was educated at Jaffna Hindu College.[2] He is a Hindu.[1] Navaratnam contested the 1989 parliamentary election as one of the Eelam People's Revolutionary Liberation Front's candidates in Jaffna District and was elected to Parliament.[3]  This article about a politician from Northern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
